channel.title: Advice on selling a domain
channel.description: Anyone ever dealt with Latonas.com for selling a domain? Was just contacted out of the blue. Not something I had previously considered but for the right price a rebrand would not be unthinkable.

item.title: Advice on selling a domain
item.dc:creator: davedevelopment
item.description:
I’ve not dealt with Latonas.com personally, but my understanding is that it belongs to Rick Latona, who is quite a famous domain name trader/investor, so I’d personally but a decent amount of trust in them.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice on selling a domain
item.dc:creator: shanelabs
item.description:
Nope, haven’t heard of them before. Be careful.
